objects.name: CreateMessage
objects.string: Click on a directory to open it.

objects.name: NewFileDesktop
objects.string: This is the Desktop folder. Press 'n' to create a new directory.

objects.name: ErrorMessage
objects.string: A directory with that name already exists.

parameters:
"Type the name of the new directory and click 'Create Directory' button
once you're done."
"A directory with that name already exists."

objects.name: NewFileDocuments
objects.string: This is the Documents folder. Press 'n' to create a new directory.

objects.name: ErrorMessage
objects.string: A directory with that name already exists.

parameters:
"Type the name of the new directory and click 'Create Directory' button
once you're done."
"A directory with that name already exists."
